section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Chief Justice Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: I have the opinion court for the Court to announce in 74-687 United States against Moore and for reasons stated in an opinion, filed this morning with the clerk, the judgment is reversed and the case is remanded to the Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit for further proceedings consistent with our opinion.
